3.text:
I live in halls of residence
so if you come this way,

6.text:
I'll show you
what it's all about.

8.text:
Mainly halls are either
girls or boys on the one landing

11.text:
but this one's
mixed as I've got my best friend

13.text:
Alex living
next door to me.

20.text:
Do you fancy
helping me out?

21.text:
I've got to show these
guys round halls.

24.text:
It's alright,
come on, you look great.

26.text:
Come on guys,
don't be shy.

29.text:
As you can see,
it's nicely decorated.

31.text:
Get a bit of colour cause
when I first moved in

32.text: it was all plain and boring.

34.text:
Basically, it's pretty simple,
just got my bed, TV,

39.text:
Yeah, I was really pleased
when I moved in

40.text:
cause I found that there
was loads of space,

42.text:
there was plenty of
storage up here

48.text:
What are you
doing in there! Are they mine?

50.text:
Yeah. Are these okay?
Can I borrow them?

52.text:
I suppose so. What are you
doing in there?

58.text:
Come on,
this is the best bit - the sink.

62.text:
There's a little shelf for
all your little toiletries

64.text:
and again, you've got more
storage underneath

66.text: so that's for like your iron.

68.text:
And you'll notice as
well it's very clean,

70.text:
I've got a little OCD
according to Alex.

77.text:
And there's a wee
little light as well.

79.text:
And there's something for
your shaver

81.text:
but I don't really shave
my face, so...

90.text:
Mmm, what are you
cooking, fajitas?

96.text:
Right, Alex, I think this
one's got your name on it.

101.text:
Thank you Hannah, ooo yeah
it does look nice doesn't it?

113.text:
What are you
still doing here?
